turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: Okay, searching for interesting cuisine that delivers to 90210... I recommend 'Spice Route,' a fantastic Indian restaurant, and 'Umami Zone,' which offers delicious Japanese ramen. Both have great reviews.  Delivery times are estimated at 45-60 minutes.

turns.speaker: user
